summary: This bill, the "PrEP and PEP are Prevention Act," mandates no-cost coverage for HIV prevention services, including PrEP and PEP medications, associated lab tests, counseling, and follow-up care. It amends various sections of the Public Health Service Act, Social Security Act (Medicare, Medicaid, CHIP), and United States Code (Federal Employees Health Benefits program) to ensure comprehensive coverage and eliminate cost-sharing for these essential preventative measures. The bill also prohibits preauthorization requirements for these services in private insurance.
